data.title: Wear  --  A wearable personal assistive listening device by Eric Rosenthal, Michelle Temple — Kickstarter
data.name: Eric Rosenthal, Michelle Temple
data.description: Wear is an affordable, attractive, lightweight wearable assistive directional microphone designed to improve quality of hearing.

data.title: DrumPants: An Entire Band in your Pocket by Tyler Freeman — Kickstarter
data.name: Tyler Freeman
data.description: World's first industrial quality wearable musical instrument. Watch someone play it to believe it.

data.title: Roadie Tuner: the ultimate guitarist tool by Band Industries — Kickstarter
data.name: Band Industries
data.description: Tune your guitar quickly and accurately, and keep your strings fit with the built in health check. Roadie is the ultimate guitar tool.

data.title: The Motion Synth: Turn Movement into Music by AUUG — Kickstarter
data.name: AUUG
data.description: Transform your iPhone or iPod touch into an intuitive and expressive motion-controlled musical instrument
